section.heading: Find Your Winter Playground
section.lead: Winter is coming. But it isn’t time to hunker down, it’s time to embrace it. Cold weather doesn’t have to mean hibernation, and after months of quarantine and limited activity, it’s time to get out there an explore. Whether you’re seeking adventure on the slopes or relaxation while cozying up by a fireplace, there’s a destination just for you.
section.body: Don’t let all of 2020 pass you by without taking a trip to some place magical. Afterall, you deserve it. Looking for an international road trip of a lifetime? We’ve got you covered. Wanting to stay domestic without sacrificing the excitement? We know just where you should go. So, pull out those jackets, lace up those boots, and get ready to embrace all winter has to offer.
